mapper.insert: insert into al_user (user_id, user_name, nick_name, user_email, user_password, user_phone, total_gold, try_times, is_locking, create_date, last_login_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalGold,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tryTimes,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{isLocking,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update al_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_gold = #{totalGold,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, try_times = #{tryTimes,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, is_locking = #{isLocking,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, nick_name, user_email, user_password, user_phone, total_gold, try_times, is_locking, create_date, last_login_time from al_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
